EmailTemplate.name: New Website Reset Password
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your email and we apologize for the issue you are having with resetting your password. We have reset your password and you should be receiving an email from us that contains a link to reset your password. This link does expire within 30 minutes.
If you do not receive an email with your reset password link please let me know.
We hope you enjoy the new yeti.com!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
